title: Nighttime sighting by motorists on Hwy 87 in Jacks Canyon, 30 miles south of Winslow
observed: on christmas eve of two thousand my cousin and I where driving on highway eighty seven. We where driving to Winslow Arizona we where about thirty miles from Winslow in the area of Jacks Canyon when we noticed a seven foot creature hairy creature walking down the side of the highway. We saw the creature in the headlights of the car as we passed the area by Jacks Canyon the creature covered its face as we passed we turned around because we couldnot believe what we saw,we both said what was that we couldnot find the creature when we had turned the car around.
location_details: JACKS CANYON ABOUT THIRTY MILES SOUTH OF WINSLOW ARIZONA
